Taliyah has better chances on midlane. 
Toplane are mostly bruiser and juggernauts. She would need to rush rylais to be able to kite. She will die whenever someone gets close to her.
Midlane are squishies, she is very good early game, deals lot of damage in early, which is why midlane is the best lane for her.

Apparently ya, it was. Same for Cassiopeia top.
Maybe it's just she was strong with the buffs she got, plus mage items are strong, and she's good against tanks while we're in a tank meta.
